%%file homework2.py
import numpy 
number=round((numpy.sqrt(2)**2)-2)

def sum_of_lists(N):
    total = 0
    for i in range(5):
        L = [j ^ (j >> i) for j in range(N)]
        total += sum(L)
        del L # remove reference to L
    return total

from homework2 import sum_of_lists
%mprun -f sum_of_lists sum_of_lists(10000)
